heading: HR00068
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON NATURAL RESOURCES TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO THE CAPACITY AND READINESS OF APPROPRIATE GOVERNMENT AGENCIES IN DEALING WITH FOREST FIRES FOR THE PURPOSE OF PREVENTION AND CONTAINMENT OF SUCH DISASTER AS WELL AS THE IMMEDIATE REHABILITATION AND/OR REFORESTATION OF DAMAGED AREAS
